name: 8th Edition of Nursing World Conference
content: We are thrilled to announce the return of the 8th Edition of Nursing World Conference (NWC 2024), marking its 8th edition in Baltimore, Maryland, USA and virtually from October 17 to 19, 2024\. This year's conference centers around the theme, "NURSE: Pioneering Research Strategies for Nursing Excellence." We aim to delve into innovative approaches in the nursing field to thrive in an ever-evolving landscape, where innovation and intelligence are paramount in navigating new challenges and advancing the profession. The healthcare industry has been at the forefront of modern technical systems and software development. Attending the Nursing World Conference provides nursing and healthcare professionals with a unique opportunity to stay updated on the latest trends in nursing practices from around the world. The event will feature keynote sessions, oral and poster presentations by esteemed professors, researchers, healthcare practitioners, and students. Additionally, there will be engaging panel discussions, informative workshops, and networking opportunities over the course of this three-day Nursing Congress. Your participation in Nursing Meetings 2024 can help bridge the current gaps in global academic and scientific efforts and contribute positively to addressing worldwide issues. Join us at this Nursing Event to be part of a dialogue focused on the most recent scientific findings, and collectively work towards resolving global concerns. Reach us at: Contact Email: nursing@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988 2320 WhatsApp: +1 434 264 7183 Dates: October 17 -19, 2024 Venue: Baltimore, Maryland, USA Website: https://nursingworldconference.com/ Abstract submission: https://nursingworldconference.com/submit-abstract Registration: https://nursingworldconference.com/register Social Media Links: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Nursingworldconference/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/NursingConf LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-hensley-902b10259/ Magnus Group YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Organiser: Magnus Group LLC - https://www.magnusgroup.org/ Conference Manager: Robert Hensley Organiser Address: Magnus Group LLC 150 South Wacker Drive #2400 Chicago, IL 60606, USA Nursing Conferences | Nursing Conference | Nursing Conferences 2024 | Nursing Conference 2024 | Nursing World Conference | Nursing Congress | Nursing Congress 2024 | Nursing World Conferences | Nursing Meetings | Nursing Meetings 2024 | Nursing Events | Nursing World Conferences 2024 | Nursing World Conference 2024 | Nursing World Congress | Nursing World Events | Nursing World Meetings | Nursing World Meetings 2024 | Nursing World Events 2024 | Nursing 2024 | Nursing Research Conferences | Nursing Research Conferences 2024 | Nursing World Research Conferences | Nursing World Research Events | Nursing World 2024 | Nursing World Congress 2024 | Nursing World Meeting | Nursing World Event 2024 | Nursing World Events | Nursing World Event | Nursing Congress in USA | NWC 2024 | Nursing Conferences USA (America) | Nursing Symposiums | Nursing Workshops | Nursing Congress in Baltimore
